parameters.name: notes
parameters.value: Sales team notified about hot lead (Score: {{$json.score}})

parameters.responseBody:
={{ {
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Lead scoring completed",
  "processed_leads": $('Calculate Lead Scores').all().length || 0,
  "hot_leads": $('Is Hot Lead').all().length || 0,
  "warm_leads": $('Is Warm Lead').all().length || 0,
  "crm_sync_leads": $('Get Leads for CRM Sync').all().length || 0,
  "actions_triggered": ["score_update", "status_update", "crm_sync"],
  "workflow_execution": "complete",
  "timestamp": $now.toISO()
} }}

parameters.subject: 🔥 Hot Lead Alert: {{$json.first_name}} {{$json.last_name}} (Score: {{$json.score}})
